text: Elizabeth "Lizzy" Pattinson is an English singer and songwriter. ==Personal life== Lizzy has a sister, Victoria and brother, actor Robert Pattinson. == Career == Lizzy has performed with the UK dance act Aurora and German duo Milk & Sugar. She was lead vocalist for them on Milk & Sugar's No. 1 Billboard Hot Dance Club Play track "Let The Sun Shine". She has had three Top 20 hits in the UK. In 2008 Lizzy recorded background vocals for the movie Twilight. She is heard on the track "Who Are They?" by Carter Burwell. == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:1983 births Category:English dance musicians Category:English singer-songwriters Category:Pop singers Category:Singers from London
title: Lizzy Pattinson
